summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Life Insurance STP Rule Engine. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend fully functional after resolving visual-edits plugin issue.

design_issues.issue: babel-metadata-plugin causing stack overflow during compilation
design_issues.fix_applied: Disabled visual edits plugin in craco.config.js

passed_tests: Products CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Rules CRUD operations with filtering and toggle
Dashboard page loads with stats and charts
Rules List page with search filtering
Rule Builder page with condition creation
Case type classification (Direct Accept, GCRP, etc.)
